(Program
  (For
    (Assignment
      (Identifier)
      (Float))
    (LessThan
      (Identifier)
      (Float))
    (Update
      (Identifier))
    (
      (If
        (Paren
          (Equal
            (Identifier)
            (Float)))
        (
          (Continue
            (Empty)))
        (Empty))
      (Empty)
      (Identifier))))
